Text:
Classification: Documentary
Genre: Action | Crime | Drama | Family | Mystery
Status: New Series
Network: ID: Investigation Discovery ( USA)
Airs: Sundays at 09:00 pm
Runtime: 60 Minutes
Premiere: February 17, 2013

Each episode invites viewers on an emotional journey between past and present as unsolved homicides are reopened. The series shows how time, technology, and burdens of the past combine to rehash old cases and open old wounds in an effort to solve haunting whodunit mysteries, finally put the culprit behind bars, and give loved ones long-awaited peace of mind.
(http://www.tvrage.com/shows/id-34602)
